name: Perimeter Scan
Lore: '''It''s a good bet the Empire knows we''re here.''',
Text: 'Use 1 Force to glance at any one card which is face-down at a location. OR Use 1 Force to glance at opponent''s hand. You may move each droid spy and Infantry Mine you find there to opponent''s Used Pile. OR Cancel Probe Telemetry.',
